introduction.commentary: ⚠️ Poor execution, needs improvement. The technician properly greeted the customer and introduced themselves.

problemDiagnosis.transcript:
[Customer] Right. So when it comes to just what to expect here in the future, I would say month to two months. I think we'll start to see. Or even sooner we'll start to see the efficiency drop again. And we still have those mold issues. I did just want to show you some different equipment options.
[Technician] I see. I see. For this. For your homework. For your homework. Because there was something. Okay, no problem.
[Technician] Are defrosting. I had a heat pump before in another place. Never had a problem with it. Yeah, 20 years ago.
problemDiagnosis.commentary: ⚠️ Fair execution with significant room for improvement. The technician asked 0 questions to understand the problem.

solutionExplanation.transcript: Yeah. Okay. Okay. And how long does it take to install the system?
solutionExplanation.commentary: ⚠️ Poor execution, needs improvement. The technician explained what work was done or will be done.

attempts.transcript: And I guess. And then the other thing I noticed is that you also have financing?

upsellAttempts.commentary: ✓ The technician made 1 upsell attempt(s). Good job identifying opportunities.

maintenancePlanOffer.commentary: ❌ Missing or not completed. Always offer maintenance plans to prevent future issues.

closing.commentary: ❌ Missing or not completed. Always thank the customer and end the call on a positive note.

salesInsights.transcript: And I guess. And then the other thing I noticed is that you also have financing?

summary: Overall call quality: 39/100. This service call needs significant improvement in multiple areas. Call type identified as: Installation. Areas for improvement: introduction, maintenance plan offering.
